text: @DrEricDing @malinablue OMG. This is criminal. We have become a banana republic. @TXMedCenter has lost its hard-won credibility. This devastates our #COVID19 public health and medical research efforts. There is no excuse @GovAbbott @texmed @SylvesterTurner @CDCgov @NIHDirector @NatlGovsAssoc @usmayors
